lender.occupational_info: I write for a living, but I'm not sure I could expalin what I write. To put it briefly, I try to explain our tax laws (motor fuels, tobacco and land transfer tax) in simple English, for both the average person and for government officials.

lender.occupational_info: I teach English language to international students in San Francisco.

lender.name: REEMA
lender.loan_because: My husband and I have always wanted to donate money to impact somebody's livelihood - no matter how small.

lender.name: Luis Dinos Moro
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world. It makes me sad to see so much poverty in the world. We can't wait for governments, we have to do this ourselves, and together we can make a difference. I'm proud to be part of Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I take chocolate and add top notch ingredients and create unique delicious chocolates.

lender.name: Thomas

lender.loan_because: I really am very pleased at the idea of being a small part of these incredible entrepreneurs' wonderful spirit and determination!

lender.loan_because: I learned early in life that everyone deserves a chance to succeed. If money is needed for someone to succeed and I have it, why not help a person out? I hope this good karma comes my way too.
lender.occupational_info: I work in LA county helping people get more out of the services the government provides. For example: food stamps, transportation, health services, housing, and jobs.

lender.occupational_info: I am a Journalism student at university. When I receive my degree, I will become an international photojournalist and documentarian. This means that I will travel around the world taking pictures of and reporting on smart, strong, industrious people like the entrepreneurs on Kiva so that the world may become aware of what true "celebrity" is.

lender.name: John and Heather
lender.loan_because: we want to contribute to the advancement of others at a time when we are just getting on our own feet. We want to give what we can and help where we can.
lender.occupational_info: We're both in school, one to teach and the other for computers. We want to make a difference in the world and put our mark somewhere.

lender.occupational_info: Business school student

lender.name: Etherealmind
lender.loan_because:
I want to put something back. When travellng in Africa a charity worker explained how to "Feed a man a fish and you've fed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and you have fed him for life".
This is my attempt to help people make their lives better everyday.
lender.occupational_info: I run a website etherealmind.com, and a share of the revenue is donated to this site. I remain opposed to Kiva offering lending in the first world.

lender.name: Edi
lender.loan_because: Until now, no credit scheme that has touched the laborer. Banks and private-party governments are more likely to give farmers capital assistance to entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: I am a graduate of high school in Jakarta, in 1996. When I finished school I was accepted to work in a foreign supermarket companies with a BILO. In 1998 I was hit by layoffs, the company hit by financial crisis. To maintain my life trying to become a pedicab driver, motorcycle taxi bike, bajaj driver and courier mail. In 2000 my mother died. Finally, I returned to my hometown to be with the father who lives alone. This kampong I began to learn traditional way of farming. Until the end I tried to become farm laborers and earn Rp 7.500,- a day. Here a lot of villages see the untapped potential, such as the utilization of agricultural production to increase income communities. Youth in my community are more likely to seek revenue to the city by becoming a worker in a factory. So many of the abandoned agricultural land or rented to farm laborers with deposit systems. But this system is very harmful because the cost of agricultural production is currently very expensive. The most dominant is the price of fertilizer. Based on this I initiated a program but a cheap farm income doubled. This program included chicken livestock, poultry fish and vegetables. The program is inter-related, such as chicken manure fertilizer can be used as vegetables. While the vegetables are not worthy of sale could be used as fish feed ingredients. To realize the program I tried talking to some community. But all have the same constraints, ie capital. Funds collected from the farmworker is very far from expectations. Finally, I consult with the bank. The result is the bank asked me with a variety of requirements such as security, income certificate, and others. The question is whether that can be used as collateral to the bank for a low-income farm workers and have no land?. This is what prompted me to write a request for a loan to Kiva. This information can be from a student at the Institute Technology of Bandung. And to write this I am trying mentranslate language through google translate. So if there are errors in the writing of thank you beg forgiveness.

lender.name: Sonia
lender.occupation: Teacher/ Currently stay at home mum
lender.loan_because: As a mother and a teacher, I have come to realise that the greatest gift you can give someone is the sense of self-empowerment. I believe in helping others to help themsleves and in turn, help those around them. In self empowerment, we can find confidence, happiness, drive and ambition to do better and be better. Something as small as lending someone $25 can change their world and the world of those around them. It's a win-win situation.
lender.occupational_info: I am a full-time stay at home who absolutely loves and is grateful for being able to spend time with my girls.

lender.name: Tommy
lender.loan_because: I love entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: I make websites.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: A small effort on my part could make a great deal of difference to someone else.

lender.name: Gilda
lender.loan_because: I need it to open a business, i am a single mother of 3 children. my youngest is 13years old who is in high school and i need to support his schooling.
lender.occupational_info: I go to offices and sell anything that my client needs.. i offer coffee, beauty products, shoes, bags etc...

lender.name: Alexis
lender.loan_because: I found about Kiva and wanted to help others across the world. I have got to a point where I have realised that earning and keeping money for myself is not very fulfilling. I wanted to enable others to put that money to good use and do something positive and productive with it instead.
lender.occupational_info: I am basically a lawyer, but in the area of intellectual property only. Patent attorneys are not typical lawyers as they come from science backgrounds, for example I did Chemistry at university. I spend my time advising clients on protections they can get for their inventions, obtaining the protection for them, and helping the inventor enforce that protection.

lender.name: Zoe
lender.loan_because: I want to give a mother a better opportunity to provide health and education for her children
lender.occupational_info: Developed violence prevention/alternative education program for high school drop-outs.

lender.name: Laylay and Keykey
lender.loan_because: I want to teach my girls about the importance of philanthropy.
lender.occupational_info: I have the opportunity to make change happen.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: I have been to 15 different countries, and know how hard it is to get ahead. I want to give my students the opportunity to help people, and understand what it is like in other countries.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher, who teaches business, entrepreneurship, and marketing. My family also does a non-profit (NGO), at www.littlehouseontheprairie.com

lender.name: Kipp
lender.loan_because: "It is every man's obligation to put back into the world at least the equivalent of what he takes out of it." - Einstein

lender.name: Charlotte
lender.loan_because: I have had many wonderful opportunities, and I think others should have the opportunity to succeed as well.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a Veterans hospital, providing care to brave men and women who have served in the Armed Forces of the United States.

lender.name: sivan
lender.loan_because: i can!
lender.occupational_info: Yefat Nefesh Miktzoit Happy Hippy

lender.name: Taylor Allis
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me.
lender.occupational_info: I sell computers

lender.name: Virginia
lender.loan_because: because I believe in helping others improve their lives. Since my retirement I have enjoyed earning pin money through a hobby and I want to share my success with others.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I think pretty much anyone can come up with $25 without hurting themselves financially. To be able to help other people with such a small amount of money is just wonderful! I have been encouraging myffriends and family to do so, also. If a lot of people do a little bit we can help make the world better for everyone.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a logistics company. It is kind of a travel agency for freight. I do the invoicing.

lender.name: Zaouri
lender.occupation: Assistant Pastor to Gospel For Africa

lender.name: shan
lender.loan_because: microfinance goes a long way in development and poverty alleviation
lender.occupational_info: im a student passionate about poverty and developmental issues, with extra interest in public policies, institutions and legal systems, and their relationship with poverty/development strategies. although im still a student, i hope to be able to change someone's life for the better in the future when i join the workforce.

lender.name: Samuel
lender.loan_because: Kiva is globalization at its best! It feels great to help someone out across the globe and it doesn't even require me to really SPEND money. I'm still a student and I'm strapped for cash but this way I can help without having to donate 120 bucks a get a complimentary DVD or something. This has a REAL effect concerning REAL people with REAL stories. I love it!
lender.occupational_info: I teach students to prepare for the entrance exams for medical school, dental school, and optometry school. I also work to help foreign doctors prepare for their US licensure exams in the hopes of securing a residency here.

lender.name: brian
lender.loan_because: I want the world to be more caring
lender.occupational_info: I take away pain and help my clients feel better about themselves

lender.name: billie
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who want to work..

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: It helps keep me grounded in these tough times. Things are hard here in America but what may be a small amount of money that would do little for someone here can do lots for someone elsewhere. I may lack power but I'm not powerless. I can still make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Flight Purser (Lead Flight Attendant). I manage inflight service on transoceanic passenger jets. I work to maintain excellent customer service to passengers and to act as a liason between the cabin crew and the pilots. I just love smiling at the passengers as they board the plane, caring for them as we fly and learning more about them and their reasons for travel.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I see so many things that need to change in the world. Too many to accomplish in my lifetime. But that won't stop me from trying. This is one small, but real way that I can help a complete stranger change their lives for the better. And I can do it over and over again on a college student's budget!
lender.occupational_info: I study at a great school (UCSD). Hopefully everything I learn I can one day use to make a difference.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I am from a single mother who worked the soil her whole life and all she needed was a break to buy land in which to build a garden nursery in Seattle, Washington. Being poor with no assets the banks would never take a chance despite her expert skills, loyal clients, and knowledge in Pacific Northwest landscaping and horticulture. Hopefully, I can give someone a chance to show the world what my mom wanted to do - i.e. make a decent living and do what they love....
lender.occupational_info: I analyze and evaulate the market value of commerical real estate for large clients in order to help them on their investment decisons.

lender.name: RFC
lender.occupation: Being the change I wish to see in the world
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference

lender.name: Justin
lender.occupation: College Student, Retail Sales, and Construction

lender.name: Caroline
lender.loan_because: "Whatever happens to the individual happens to the whole group, and whatever happens to the whole group happens to the individual. The individual can only say: 'I am, because we are; and since we are, therefore I am.'" - Mbiti 1969:109

lender.name: Lesley Massard
lender.loan_because:
I am passionate about community work. I admire the entrepreneurial spirit as well as the determination and focus needed to pave your own path in this world. I enjoy being a part of Kiva because it is an amazing organization which bridges different parts of the world and allows me the great opportunity to make a difference in the lives of others. I believe we all have a responsibility to help and support others in any way we can.
"I've learned that you shouldn't go through life with a catcher's mitt on both hands; you need to be able to throw something back." - Maya Angelou

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: To aid those in need through finance.
lender.occupational_info: Bringing corporate and foundation money to humanitarian and development projects around the world.

lender.name: Mike McHugh
lender.loan_because: Growing up in middle-class America, I have had many opportunities that have enabled and empowered me to grow and succeed. I have also seen extreme poverty first-hand. I want to do what I can to help people in difficult circumstances support themselves.
lender.occupational_info: For work, I design and build computers and electronic devices. For fun, I make and play music.

lender.name: Hannah
lender.loan_because: it is powerful and proactive

lender.name: mike
lender.loan_because: Capitalism works.
lender.occupational_info: Hollywood and Politics

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: I want to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I help entrepreneurs use social media and Internet marketing to build a successful business.

lender.name: LAURA
lender.loan_because: I believe people can succeed. Investing in people is a great idea!

lender.name: Christa
lender.loan_because: I want directly help entrepreneurs and encourage them to grow their business. This is the best way for a better future!
lender.occupational_info: I am in sales and marketing since more than 20 years. We sell lab instrumentation to all pharmaceutical companies.

lender.name: ieishah c.
lender.loan_because: i can.
lender.occupational_info: i'm an urban ethnographer, collecting experiences, stories, photos and videos from my travels around the world, and sharing them.

lender.name: Billy
lender.loan_because: I am blessed to live in a state of comparative wealth to most others.
lender.occupational_info: Hard but rewarding. In my business life, as in my personal life, what I really like is a win-win situation, one where both parties feel good about the interaction. I like it when we both feel good better than when just I feel good.

lender.name: Laura Grace
lender.loan_because: I have the ability---and sometimes I forget that I am fortunate to have it. Kiva is a wonderful reminder.

lender.name: Theresa
lender.loan_because: It's the best way to support entrepreneurial initiatives :-)
lender.occupational_info: Telecommunications and computer (ICT) specialist

lender.loan_because: I Know how hard a business is to start & maintain in this country (US) and know without capital it can not happen in any country.
lender.occupational_info: Retail, Service and Repair of Vacuum Cleaners

lender.name: CHARLES
lender.loan_because: I am very passionate to make poverty reduction across the globe
lender.occupational_info: Youth leadership,mentoring and Discipleship development.

lender.name: Jena
lender.loan_because: I want to help out fellow entrepreneurs!
lender.occupational_info: I help people learn to talk again after stroke or brain injury. I also help fellow speech therapists learn how to go into business for themselves.

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: I know what a big difference even a small amount of money can make when you have little or no money. I am where I am because somebody helped me; now I want to do the same.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it is to start your own business with not much money. I am working on starting my second at home business.
lender.occupational_info: I have helped parents learn about cloth diapering, baby wearing and green living. And now, I am helping children with food allergies and other medical conditions stay safe with Alert Wear.

lender.name: Kirk
lender.loan_because: those who can help, should help

lender.name: Leanne
lender.loan_because: I can. I like that I can provide someone with the foundation and tools they need to support themselves, their family and their community. It makes me feel connected and grounded.
lender.occupational_info: I develop programs (voluntary and incentive) to prevent the sources of our drinking water from becoming contaminated.

lender.name: Monica
lender.loan_because: You must give to your fellow men. Even if it's a little thing, do something for others - something for which you get no pay but the privilege of doing. -Albert Schweitzer

lender.name: Cory
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student learning about law.

lender.name: Noah

lender.name: sarah

lender.occupational_info: I enjoy making great websites.

lender.occupational_info: Determine if an idea is new and if it deserves legal protection.

lender.occupation: Data Technician in the US Marine Corps
lender.loan_because: people have dreams and goals. why not help them to find yours.
lender.occupational_info: I make the internet work. I connect sailors, marines, and soldiers to their loved ones back home.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: i like to help people

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I believe that given the opportunity people can and will make their own way forward. I am excited by the opportunity to be a partner with entrepreneurs around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a family foundation that focuses its efforts on health in the developing world.

lender.name: Dason
lender.occupational_info: Statistician

lender.name: Clark Haptonstall
lender.loan_because: I saw Kiva co-founder Jessica Jackley speak at Rice University and I was inspired by her passion to help others help themselves

lender.name: S.T.E.P.
lender.loan_because: We believe that change begins with the first step.
lender.occupational_info: Our club focuses on helping people in poverty stricken areas. We raise money through different fundraisers at our high school.

lender.name: Philip
lender.loan_because: I believe in positive spirit. I have type 1 diabetes and know how to educate and motivate others who are struggling with diabetes how to take charge and manage it. Your donations will help anyone with diabetes. Thank you.
lender.occupational_info: I motivate those with diabetes to live healthy active lives. I have had type 1 diabetes for 36 years and it is time to give back and help others!

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: Success is made up of many components one of which is opportunity. I want to help provide that opportunity. Anything is possible with hard work and perseverance. Good luck to all the entrepreneurs!

lender.name: Susanne
lender.loan_because: If you want to reach something, you've never had before, you have to do something, you've never done before!

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: It's wonderful to be able to help people not only at home, but around the world!

lender.name: Laressa
lender.loan_because: I want every woman to be able to provide for herself and her family.

lender.name: C-VEHW Group
lender.loan_because: We want to support the eradication of blindness and poverty which sometimes go together.
lender.occupational_info: Promoting healthy eyes among community members while facilitating skills development for social inclusion among the youth.

lender.name: Tricia
lender.loan_because: I visited Cambodia and loved the people I met

lender.name: carla
lender.loan_because: i want to help others who are less fortunate than myself

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to better the their lives and the lives of their families, this is an easy way for me to help them do so.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the oil industry.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in this world. I want to help people start their own businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell their homes.

lender.name: stefani
lender.loan_because: when i was in Kenya I met many smart, motivated people who just need someone to get them started. I loan because I believe that together we can change the world.
lender.occupational_info: I sell software!

lender.name: Cecilia
lender.loan_because: I want to support Vision 2020 's global initiative to eradicate blindness
lender.occupational_info: Nursery Nurse

lender.name: Aaron & Jean
lender.occupational_info: Jean is an associate director of class giving for a college and Aaron is the art director of a teen virtual world website.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: It kind of feels good to feel you're helping someone in some far off place. It's just a little added to everyone else's little...what a great idea
lender.occupational_info: I work as a call center customer service agent working with our clients trying to put them on vacation. !!!But I'd rather be fishing!!!

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I want to help people provide better lives for themselves and their children.

lender.name: Kevin J.
lender.loan_because: I support the development of Africa. I have a keen interest in the upliftment of our Mother Land. I strive to enhance the lives of others. I believe entrepreneurism is the key to life/world sustainability.
lender.occupational_info: I encourage folks to obtain their life's worth. I am blessed with the ability to provide tools and resources to bring out the best in humans.

lender.name: Wren
lender.loan_because: I lend because my family is stable and secure, and if I can help someone else achieve just a tiny bit of what I have, then I will be very happy. It is so important to feel safe... emotionally, physically and financially.
lender.occupational_info: I am the mother of two young boys and I struggle to find the balance in this crazy world.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: It matters.

lender.name: Janel
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of microfinance to lift people out of extreme poverty. I also think that making a positive difference for someone, no matter how small, makes our world a better place.

lender.name: John Gregory
lender.occupational_info: John is a master of New Media Marketing combined with the incredible power of Web 2.0, He is on the cutting edge when it comes to cost effective global Internet marketing strategies and with his finger on the pulse of this rapidly changing industry, he can help you and your business understand and profit from the world’s newest marketing channels. Learn more by visiting : http://John-Gregory.com

lender.name: Mel and Todd
lender.loan_because: What a great way to help others help themselves! I feel great, the entrepreneur feels great - Everyone wins.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: Own retail stores

lender.name: vaike
lender.loan_because: I want to help people! and this is at a level I can afford!
lender.occupational_info: a big mixture of bookkeeping, theatre, dancing and being a mum!

lender.name: Mads Holm Oldfield
lender.loan_because: I believe the best way to make poor countries richer, is to get business going. Kiva is a brilliant way to support entrepenurial people.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I enjoy seeing someone wanting to help themselves and being able to be a part of it.

lender.name: Hoskies
lender.loan_because: I want to venture into agribusiness otherwise agriculture business
lender.occupational_info: to venture into vegetable, onions, tomatoes, green maize and supply in chain stores

lender.name: Sherryn
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for how gifted my life is and I want others to reach their full potential also

lender.name: Gail
lender.occupational_info: In my previous occupation (20+years) I led a commercial banking group that financed commercial real estate development primarily in Ohio and the southeastern United States. Currently, I am a full time homemaker with four teenagers.

lender.name: Ana
lender.loan_because: I grew up in Guatemala and although I was fortunate to have an education and needs covered, I am also aware of the need in places like my country, a little in those countries can go a long way!

lender.name: Lizzie
lender.occupation: Child Safety Officer and Uni Student
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves support when they are passionate about achieving something and improving their life and the lives of those around them. I would want the same for my family, my friends and myself.
lender.occupational_info: I help parents & families learn about how to keep their children safe through a charity called Kidsafe.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: If everyone makes a small action with a great intention it will gradually lead to a huge positive change. I believe that political and social barriers can be worn away and people can be given the opportunity to realise and reach their potential.
lender.occupational_info: I teach a class of 34 7-8 year olds in a Christian school in a market town in Wiltshire, England. Every day is so different and so much fun, it's what gets me out of bed each day!

lender.name: Grace
lender.loan_because: My dad set this up for me. I have money in the bank that I can't use until I grow up, so he thought this would be a good idea. He's going to save all the emails about people I help, so I can read them some day.
lender.occupational_info: My most important work is helping people smile and remember that they have a God-spot inside no matter what.

lender.name: Michael
lender.occupational_info: I am a graduate student at Rice University in Houston, Texas.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I want to see people become the person they wish to be and not the person they are forced to be.
lender.occupational_info: We strive to help the world.

lender.name: jojoSOUL
lender.loan_because: Nothing is as important as building the connection between people with difficult circumstances and people who can help.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a food store that my father owns, and I teach people how to play drums. I am also a musician and am currently starting my own business.

lender.name: Marc
lender.loan_because: It's right to give people a helping hand to allow them to improve their place in life. I will try to do a $25 investment per class per semester with my students.

lender.name: Todd
lender.loan_because: helping others is being in the oneness of life. giving and receiving are one in the same. both help both parties :)
lender.occupational_info: in creating is the most powerful place of being. so i try to go there, in whatever form, daily.
